trait.name: Flight
trait.desc: Allows easy travel over any terrain.

trait.name: Swimming
trait.desc: Freely move in water terrain.

trait.name: Counterbomb
trait.desc: Chance to survive fatal blow once per battle.

trait.name: Attack+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases physical attack slightly.

trait.name: Attack+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases physical attack a moderate amount.

trait.name: Attack+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases physical attack a lot.

trait.name: Defense+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases physical defense slightly.

trait.name: Defense+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases physical defense a moderate amount.

trait.name: Defense+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases physical defense a lot more

trait.name: Magic+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases magic attack slightly.

trait.name: Magic+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases magic attack a moderate amount.

trait.name: Magic+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases magic attack a lot more.

trait.name: M. Defense+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases magic defense slightly.

trait.name: M. Defense+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases magic defense a moderate amount.

trait.name: M. Defense+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases magic defense a lot more.

trait.name: Fast Reflex
trait.desc: Increases chance of evading by 5%.

trait.name: Mirage
trait.desc: Increases chance of evading by 15%.

trait.name: Danmaku Master
trait.desc: Increases chance to evade by 30%.

trait.name: Sharp Eyes
trait.desc: Increases chance to hit by 5%.

trait.name: Homing Attack
trait.desc: Increases chance to hit by 15%.

trait.name: Lock On
trait.desc: Increases chance to hit by 30%.

trait.name: Sneak
trait.desc: Allows this unit to pass through enemies.

trait.name: Move+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases movement range by 1.

trait.name: Move+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases movement range by 2.

trait.name: Move+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases movement range by 3.

trait.name: Regen Lv.1
trait.desc: Regenerates a small amount of HP each turn.

trait.name: Regen Lv.2
trait.desc: Regenerates a medium amount of HP each turn.

trait.name: Regen Lv.3
trait.desc: Regenerates a large amount of HP each turn.

trait.name: Critical+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases chance for a critical hit by 10%.

trait.name: Critical+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases chance for a critical hit by 15%.

trait.name: Critical+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases chance for a critical hit by 20%.

trait.name: Magic Reactor
trait.desc: Marisa's magical item which regenerates a small amount of Spirit Charge per turn up to 500.

trait.name: Yin-Yang Orb
trait.desc: Reimu's magical item which regenerates a small amount of Spirit Charge per turn up to 500.

trait.name: Healing+ Lv.1
trait.desc: Increases effectiveness of healing spells by 10%.

trait.name: Healing+ Lv.2
trait.desc: Increases effectiveness of healing spells by 20%.

trait.name: Healing+ Lv.3
trait.desc: Increases effectiveness of healing spells by 30%.

trait.name: Deadly Strike
trait.desc: Increased chance of a critical hit.

trait.name: Time Stop
trait.desc: Increases accuracy and chance of critical hits.

trait.name: Danmaku Sniper
trait.desc: Increased the maximum and minimum range of attack spells by 1.

trait.name: Extended Healing
trait.desc: Increased the maximum range of healing spells and items by 1.

trait.name: Extend Range
trait.desc: Decreases attack power by 15%, but increases the range of offensive spells by 1.

trait.name: Close Combat
trait.desc: Increases attack power, but decreases attack range by 1 (minimum 1).

trait.name: Immortal Phoenix
trait.desc: Revives from death once with 1HP and a 300 SC penalty.

trait.name: Nine Lives
trait.desc: Revives from death once with 50% HP and a 600 SC penalty.

trait.name: Hourai Elixir
trait.desc: Revives from death once with 100% HP at the cost of all SC. Overrides other revive traits.

trait.name: Hourai Blade
trait.desc: Increases magic attack by 15%, decreases magic defense by 10%.

trait.name: Shanghai Shield
trait.desc: Increases magic defense by 15%, decreases magic attack by 10%.

trait.name: Fighting Spirit
trait.desc: Spirit charge change per action is multiplied by 1.2.

trait.name: Hard Worker
trait.desc: Increases EXP gained by 1.2x.

trait.name: Good Health Charm
trait.desc: Decreases the chance of physical status effects working.

trait.name: Anti-Curse Charm
trait.desc: Decreases the chance of magical status effects working.

trait.name: Support Duration+
trait.desc: Increases the duration of buffs from support spells by 2 turns.

trait.name: Dispel Effect
trait.desc: All healing spell actions also have a curative effect on Poison, Movement Down, and Dizzy.

trait.name: Spirit Saver
trait.desc: Decreases the spirit charge costs for spells by 20%, but makes them less effective by 20%.

trait.name: Spirit Booster
trait.desc: Increases the spirit charge costs for spells by 20%, but makes them more effective by 20%.

trait.name: Eternal Flame
trait.desc: Provides a resistance to Spiritual and Elemental spells.

trait.name: Attack and Move
trait.desc: Enables a unit to move after a spell action is used if a previous move has not been made.

trait.name: Reporter's Reflex
trait.desc: Initiates a counterattack action before an enemy takes action.

trait.name: Youkai Exterminator
trait.desc: Additional damage (1.1x) against lower level enemies.

trait.name: Fog Veil
trait.desc: Gives the status "Fog Veil", making this unit untouchable to spell action attacks when enveloped in fog.

trait.name: Apothecary
trait.desc: Increases the effectiveness of healing items this unit uses.

trait.name: Snack Expert
trait.desc: Increases the effectiveness of healing items used on this unit.

trait.name: Vaccination
trait.desc: Decreases the chance of physical status effects working.

trait.name: Moonstone Lantern
trait.desc: The glow of this lantern negates the evasive bonuses of enemies in the fog against Kaguya's attacks.

trait.name: Fire Rat's Coat
trait.desc: This artifact provides a degree of protection against Elemental and Natural spells.

trait.name: Dragon's Jewel
trait.desc: This artifact increases magic attack and accuracy slightly.

trait.name: Hourai's Branch
trait.desc: This artifact increases magic greatly, but reduces evasion.

trait.name: Barrier Master
trait.desc: Yukari's mastery of protective barriers shields against Spiritual and Force spells.

trait.name: Death's Blessing
trait.desc: As an undead being, Yuyuko is more resistant to natural-type spells.

trait.name: Invitation
trait.desc: Instantly dispatch weaker enemies struck with a critical hit.

trait.name: Heli-pack
trait.desc: Prototype helicopter backpack allows for flight and greater movement.

trait.name: Kappa Scope
trait.desc: Kappa's device which increases accuracy and range.

trait.name: Optical Camo
trait.desc: Experimental cloaking field generator dramatically increases evasion.

trait.name: Holy Tree Charm
trait.desc: Decreases the chance of all status effects working.

trait.name: TS Test Trait
trait.desc: test

trait.name: Airlift
trait.desc: Picks up an adjacent unit and allows this unit to carry them. Requires Flight to be active.

trait.name: Dizzy Attack
trait.desc: All nearby enemy units and the user have a 75% chance of becoming dizzy, reducing their accuracy.

trait.name: Cat's Curse
trait.desc: Removes positive status effects from nearby enemy units.

trait.name: Illusion Field
trait.desc: Casts a spell that increases the evasion of all nearby allies.

trait.name: Focused Movement
trait.desc: For this action, increases attack and accuracy, but this unit movement range is decreased.

trait.name: Teleport
trait.desc: Teleports to any location.

trait.name: Double Action
trait.desc: This unit can attack two targets in one turn.

trait.name: Summon Doll
trait.desc: Alice can summon up to two dolls to help her per battle.

trait.name: Magic Fortress
trait.desc: Summons a barrier to decrease all damage taken by 25% and increases magic attack by 25%.

trait.name: Field Medic
trait.desc: Recovers 15% of max HP to all nearby allies.

trait.name: Dispel History
trait.desc: Removes all negative status effects from a unit.

trait.name: Unleash Grimoire
trait.desc: Alice draws power from the inside of her magic book, greatly increasing magic attack.

trait.name: Purify
trait.desc: Removes all status effects from self.

trait.name: Self Destruct
trait.desc: Detonates and does damage to any adjacent units.

trait.name: Hypnotize
trait.desc: Hypnotizes a distant enemy and makes them dizzy.

trait.name: Moonglow
trait.desc: The glow of the moon places a distance enemy in a trance, causing them to freeze in place for one turn.

trait.name: Regeneration Field
trait.desc: Gives Regen status to nearby allies.

trait.name: Poison Cloud
trait.desc: Eirin tosses lots of shady potions around, poisoning nearby enemies.

trait.name: Secret Formula
trait.desc: This dangerous concoction has unpredictable effects on nearby enemies and allies alike.

trait.name: False Image
trait.desc: Reisen's illusion powers let her effectively hide for one turn.

trait.name: Antidote Cloud
trait.desc: Eirin's latest invention is a curative gas that neutralizes poisons.

trait.name: Moonstone Arrow
trait.desc: A shot from Eirin's arrow lights up the surrounding area.

trait.name: Reactivate
trait.desc: Yukari casts a spell to let Ran and Chen to do her bidding once more this turn.

trait.name: Portal Express
trait.desc: Recalls any friendly unit next to Yukari with one of her gap portals.

trait.name: Spirit Away
trait.desc: Spirits away an enemy unit to a position adjacent to Yukari. Cannot be used after moving.

trait.name: Butterfly Storm
trait.desc: Releases a swarm of butterflies to damage nearby enemies and drain health to Yuyuko.

trait.name: Spirit Blossom
trait.desc: Drains the spirit charge from nearby enemies to Yuyuko.

trait.name: Shikigami: Chen
trait.desc: Ran's presence strengthens Chen's STR and MAG by 40% and evasion by 10% if she is adjacent to Ran.

trait.name: Calculator
trait.desc: Ran's presence strengthen any adjacent ally's magic by 20%.

trait.name: Black Cat
trait.desc: The aura of bad luck surrounding Chen decreases enemy hit rate by 10% at a range of 2.

trait.name: Tactician
trait.desc: Ability to reads the enemies' movements increases the accuracy of nearby units by 10%.

trait.name: Mist Field
trait.desc: Ayaka's mist veil enhances the evasion of all units around her by 25%.

trait.name: Youkai Professor
trait.desc: Keine's knowledge of enemy attacks increases MDEF and DEF of nearby units.

trait.name: Hunter and Teacher
trait.desc: Mokou and Keine's DEF and MDEF increase by 30% if adjacent to each other. Evasion increases by 10%.

trait.name: Eternal Rivals
trait.desc: Mokou and Kaguya's STR and MAG increase by 30% if adjacent to each other. Hit rate increases by 10%.

trait.name: Malice Cannon
trait.desc: Alice and Marisa's MAG increase by 40% if they are adjacent to each other.

trait.name: Puppet Master
trait.desc: Gives a 15% STR/MAG boost to Dolls when within range

trait.name: Buddha's Bowl
trait.desc: This legendary artifact increases the defense of units standing near Kaguya.

trait.name: Swallow's Shell
trait.desc: This legendary artifact increases the magic defense of units standing near Kaguya.

trait.name: Brain of Eientei
trait.desc: Increases the accuracy and evasion of Reisen and Kaguya if they are adjacent to Eirin.

trait.name: Shikigami: Ran
trait.desc: Yukari strengthens Ran's MAG by 30% and evasion by 20% if Ran is adjacent to Yukari.

trait.name: Border Team
trait.desc: Reimu and Yukari's MAG and MDEF increase by 20% if they are adjacent to each other.

trait.name: Mischevious Duo
trait.desc: Yuyuko and Yukari's MAG increases by 30% if they are adjacent to each other.

trait.name: Loyal Guardian
trait.desc: Yuyuko's DEF and MDEF increases by 30% while Youmu's STR increases by 30% if they are adjacent.
